scripts.setup: touch .env; grep -q ANTHROPIC_API_KEY .env || echo 'ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=' >> .env; grep -q GOOGLE_API_KEY .env || echo 'GOOGLE_API_KEY=' >> .env; grep -q OLLAMA_MODEL .env || echo 'OLLAMA_MODEL=' >> .env; echo 'Setup complete. Edit .env if you need to add keys.'
scripts.frontend:build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cargo run -- serve" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
